name: Penguin no Mondai+ Bakushou! Roulette Battle!!
name_original: Penguin no Mondai+ Bakushou! Roulette Battle!!
description:
Penguin no Mondai+ Bakushou! Roulette Battle!! is an arcade game developed by Alchemist. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Alchemist.
You can play Penguin no Mondai+ Bakushou! Roulette Battle!! on Nintendo 3DS.
